"As long as your spark is intact I will protect. I made you that 
promise and I'd sooner be deleted then fail in that promise." 
Lunarpine looked deeply into Shadow Wings big beautiful eyes to show 
what his words truly meant, he was throwing instinct to the pit and 
becoming more complete with each moment with her, his grip on her 
hand tightened as he placed his other arm around her shoulder to hold 
her in an embracing hug. "If I could enter your mind and face your 
nightmares you'd never have to worry about the dark again."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She took his hand and gently wrapped her hand around his.  She was 
> glad to see that he wasn't hurt.  She took a step closer to him so 
> ther was only a few inches of space between them. She smiled.
> "I'm glad to hear that you are OK." She leaned closer to him and 
> whispered into his ear,"But trust me my beloved, if I ever get 
eaten 
> by a cat like that again, just shoot me and get it over with. Or 
you 
> will never hear the end of it. Got it?"  She kissed him on the 
cheek 
> and looked at him.  she smiled and chuckled."I've nightmares about 
it 
> since. And my TeddyOwl is no help." She smiled warmly at him.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > "Glad to see your up and about Wing" Lunarpine said with a grin 
on 
> his bot
> > face." Lets make a deal, how about we stop taking turns putting 
> each other
> > in the CR chamber and avoid getting hurt to begin with." he held 
> his hand
> > out to her.
